mapper.select:
select sdt.* from sys_dict_type sdt
and dict_name like concat('%', #{dictType.dictName}, '%')
and status = #{dictType.status}
and dict_type like concat('%', #{dictType.dictType}, '%')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{dictType.params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{dictType.params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
